ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتَّ مِنْهُمْ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَهُمْ فِى كُلِّ مَرَّةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those with whom you make a treaty and who then break it every time. They have no taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for those with whom you have made a treaty and who abrogate it every time, and do not fear God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (especially) those with whom you entered into a covenant and then they broke their covenant time after time, and who do not fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who make promises but break them every time, and who have no piety.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those with whom you made a treaty, then they break their agreement each time and do not fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those with whom you made a covenant, but they break their covenant every time and they do not have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those with whom you make an agreement, then they break their agreement every time and they do not guard (against punishment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those of them with whom thou hast made compact then they break their compact every time, not being godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those of them with whom thou madest a treaty, and then at every opportunity they break their treaty, and they keep not duty (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those with whom you have made a covenant, and who break their covenant on every occasion and have no fear [of God].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They with whom thou covenantedest, then they break their covenant every time, and they fear not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —Those with whom you made a treaty, and who violated their treaty every time, and who are not Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They are those with whom thou didst make a covenant, but they break their covenant every time, and they have not the fear (of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those with whom you made a covenant, but they break their covenant every time and they do not fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: those with whom you have made a treaty, then break their treaty with you every time; having no fear (of Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those of them with whom you made a treaty, but they violate their agreement every time. They are not righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The ones with whom you made a treaty but then they break their pledge every time, and they do not fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:56] those of them with whom you have made a pact, not to support the idolaters, and then break their pact every time, they conclude one, and they are not fearful, of God, in their treachery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah explained who these are, saying: (Those of them with whom thou madest a treaty) the Banu Qurayzah, (and, then at every opportunity they break their treaty, and they keep not duty (to Allah)) they do not ward off breaking their treaties.
